attr.title: Astronite
attr.desc: Astronite is a 1bit metroidvania that combines action, exploration, puzzles and platforms. Recover the planet where you and yours lived before it was invaded by strange creatures.
attr.inst: Download game from https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489590/Astronite/ , copy data.win and all .ogg files to /ports/astronite/gamedata
